## Potential Formulars and how to write them in LaTeX syntax

 Logistic Regression for Hate Speech Definition Complexity:
 
 $$ \log\left(\frac{P(Y = k)}{P(Y = K)}\right) = \beta_{0k} + \beta_{1k}X_{1} + \beta_{2k}X_{2} + ... + \beta_{pk}X_{p} $$
 
 Linear or Ordinal Logistic Regression for Polarization Score:
 
 $$ Y = \beta_0 + \beta_1X_1 + \beta_2X_2 + ... + \beta_pX_p + \epsilon $$
$$ \log\left(\frac{P(Y \leq j)}{P(Y > j)}\right) = \alpha_j - (\beta_1X_1 + \beta_2X_2 + ... + \beta_pX_p) $$
